TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner

summary.span: 提供 控制項的設計階段支援。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的公用實作基底類別，用於呈現設計階段控制項。 is a public implementation of the base class for the purpose of rendering controls at design time. 它會加入至設計檢視中，從關聯的控制項的區域資訊帶入功能，但不會變更父控制項的功能。It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control. 如有其他控制項的設計工具，您可以變更的自訂設計階段呈現控制項繼承自和覆寫方法。As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom controls by inheriting from and overriding the method. 如果您想要覆寫方法時，務必要包含基底實作以保留區域資訊。If you want to override the method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立簡單的自訂控制項可讓使用者變更目標控制項的屬性。The following code example creates a simple custom control that allows the user to change the property of the target control. 相關聯驗證控制項，並在它隱藏的設計階段使用標籤說明取代使用者輸入的文字方塊。The associated validates the control and replaces the user input text box at design time with a label explaining that it is hidden. [!code-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/SecretEditorPart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/secreteditorpart.vb#1)] 為了讓自訂控制項來呈現，頁面必須有控制項，與位於，控制項和包含自訂控制項動作，如下列所示程式碼範例。In order for the custom control to render, the page must have a control, an with a for the control to reside in, and a containing a control for the custom to act on, as shown in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/default.aspx#2)] 如若要在執行階段中都無法使用，請編輯模式必須啟用頁面上。For the to be usable at run time, edit mode must be enabled on the page. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用程式碼後置檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to do so with a code-behind file. [!code-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/Default.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/default.aspx.vb#3)]

summary.span: 建立相關聯 控制項的複本，以在設計階段呈現。

span.span: Creates a copy of the associated control to render at design time.

returns.span: 相關聯 控制項的複本。

span.span: A copy of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將區域資訊複製到檢視控制項的覆寫此方法。This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.

summary.span: 驗證控制項是否位於型別為 的區域，然後取得用於在設計階段表示控制項的標記。

span.span: Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type , and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用於在設計階段表示控制項的標記，如果控制項不在 中，則為錯誤標記。

span.span: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an .
